similar.title: Challenges facing coronavirus disease 2019: Psychiatric services for patients with mental disorders.
text: Challenges facing coronavirus disease 2019: Psychiatric services for patients with mental disorders.
As a Public Health Emergency of International Concern declared by WHO, the current outbreak of coronavirus disease (COVID-19) in China has captured the world's attention.(1).
